entry.title: Isaac Newton
entry.subtitle: 25 December 1642 â€“ 20 March 1726/27
entry.short: English mathematician, physicist, astronomer, theologian, and author (described in his own day as a "natural philosopher") who is widely recognised as one of the most influential scientists of all time, and a key figure in the scientific revolution
entry.name: isaac-newton
entry.content: English mathematician, physicist, astronomer, theologian, and author (described in his own day as a "natural philosopher") who is widely recognised as one of the most influential scientists of all time, and a key figure in the scientific revolution
